questions.title: Би гэрэгэ пасспортоо хэрхэн ашиглах вэ?
questions.content: Та Гэрэгэ пасспортын хамтрагч байгууллагуудын онцлогоос хамаарч Гэрэгэ пасспортоо үзүүлэх, Гэрэгэ пасспортын ард хэсгийн QR кодыг уншуулах, зарим шаардлагатай тохиолдолд гэрэгэ пасспорттой дагалдаж ирсэн сим картны утасны дугаарыг бүртгүүлэн үйлчлүүлнэ.

footer.copyright: Copyright 2024. ⓒ GEREGE TOURIST PASSPORT. All Rights Reserved.

AboutGeregePassport.title: GEREGE TOURIST PASSPORT
AboutGeregePassport.subtitle: Must-have item for travel Mongolia
AboutGeregePassport.description: Even today, the spirit of the ancient Gerege lives on through the Gerege Passport, offering special privileges and exclusive benefits in Mongolia. Own a piece of this historical tradition by purchasing your Gerege Passport for just $55 and enjoy its modern-day advantages.
AboutGeregePassport.buttonDescription: $1 from every purchase is donated to support children with special needs at the 10th Kindergarten.

AboutGeregeHistory.title: GEREGE in History
AboutGeregeHistory.description: In the 13th century, during the reign of Genghis Khan, the Gerege gold badge served as a passport for travelers and royal messengers. Holding the badge ensured them unhindered travel and facilitated access to goods and services from local communities.
